mapper.insert: insert into board (seq,id,name,email,subject,content,ref,logtime) values (seq_board.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, seq_board.currval, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn, tt.* from ( select * from board order by ref desc, step asc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
